pullRequest.title: Fix TNT not pushing creative players
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #2386
Also fixes OBFHELPER on wrong predicate - to how it was in 1.15: https://github.com/PaperMC/Paper/blob/ver/1.15.2/Spigot-Server-Patches/0352-Add-LivingEntity-getTargetEntity.patch#L118

nodes.bodyText:
this can't be left as is.
While yes notSpectator does belong on the other method, its more so these methods were backwards
f is canAITarget and needs to be maintained, and this getTargetEntity needs to keep using this same selector as canAITarget instead of notSpectator

lets flip the dead check to be first and use isAlive()
so -> entity.isAlive() && !entity.isSpectator()
there is no reason to use the IEntitySelector here, so we can drop the obf helper as nothing else uses it once you clean up the other patches usage as i mentioned in the other review comment

beforeCommit.message: Fix TNT not pushing creative players
Rename 'notSpectator' to 'canAITarget' and move it to previously used field

afterCommit.message: Rename 'notSpectator' to 'canAITarget' and move it to previously used field
